price: 66. Waxaana ka yeelnay ciqaabtan mid ay ku cibrad qaataan kuwaa joogay waqtigaa iyo kuwii ka dambeeyey iyo waano ku socota kuwa Alle ka cabsada (ee iska jira Ciqaabkiisa) .
arabic: فَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا نَكَٰلٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهَا وَمَا خَلۡفَهَا وَمَوۡعِظَةٗ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fajaʿalnāhā nakālan limā bayna yadayhā wamā khalfahā wamawʿiẓatan lil'muttaqīna
